text: Kumakahpan is a Wayana village in the Sipaliwini District of Suriname. The village lies on the banks of the Lawa River, which forms the border with French Guiana. == Name == Kumakahpan means "place of the Kapok tree". == Geography == Kumakahpan lies about downstream the Lawa River from the village of Antecume Pata and upstream the Lawa River from the villages of Kulumuli and Pïleike. == Notes == == References == Category:Populated places in Sipaliwini District
title: Kumakahpan
